titleStmt.title: The honest ghost, or, A voice from the vault
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing, NUC pre-1956 imprints to Brathwait.
First leaf is a description of the frontispiece.
Includes: Two poems penned by the author before his restraint, entituled Loves lottery and The cuckow : whereunto are annexed [6 others].
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
